Body:
I made a simple gateway that can connect iot sensor and blockchain network and in the security side, I want to make some validation in that gateway because probably there will be more than one gateway that will connect to iot sensor and my blockchain network (in case there are some unvalid gateways trying to connect to my blockchain network). So how my code can determine which one is valid gateway and which is not?

I have a gateway code program that I made that can connect between iot sensor and my blockchain network and I want to add some validation code to it. I've been thinking that I can add some gateway list in my blockchain network and the gateway program code can validate itself. Is that possible and secure enough?

This is rather broad for a SO question. At is it about security, you could try to ask on [Information Security](https://security.stackexchange.com/). But anyway you will have to give more details on what you want to control and where. In any site the current question is too broad.
